name: Expanding Horizons (BETA)
description:
Expanding Horizons is a 2D FMG (female muscle growth) game. The game revolves around you managing a lab, where you conduct FMG experiments. You can follow my deviantart page for more info on new game updates or the game in general. 

THIS GAME INVOLVES FMG CONTENT!!! IF YOU DO NOT ENJOY SUCH TOPICS I DO NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING!!!
